description:
Seth, Mélie, and Doc encounter new allies in Caislean Merlin—the stronghold of the Knights-sorcerers, a group that is also after the monster called Némésis. But Caislean Merlin is plagued by the Spectrum Némésis, mysterious beings that are rumored to be harbingers of catastrophe. Will Seth be able to discover the secret behind this new form of Némésis? His adventure accelerates with the addition of Ocoho, a girl who hopes to become a Knight-sorcerer, a farewell with Mélie and Doc, and a clash with the malicious Merchant-Barons! And all this with the Inquisition still at his heels!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description: [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tonytonyvalente/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tonyvalenteofficial) | Wiki (en) Tony Valente is a French comic book author. He is the first author of "French Mangas" to be published in Japan, for his work Radiant, through the publisher Asukashinsha in the Euromanga1 collection as well as with the help of [Yusuke Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/96903/Yuusuke-Murata) and [Hiro Mashima](https://anilist.co/staff/96882/Hiro-Mashima).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/daiki_fukuoka)

**Daiki Fukuoka** is a Japanese director, episode director, production manager and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mtocoda/)

He worked as a music composer for Capcom after graduating from the Kunitachi College of Music. He left the company in 2003 and founded Design Wave in 2007, and is still working as a composer for video games.  He is known for his work on the Devil May Cry and Monster Hunter series.

Halo at Yojouhan is a Japanese rock band from Sakura, Chiba Prefecture.

A four-member rock band formed in 2012 in Sakura City, Chiba Prefecture.​ The audience is fascinated by their "one and only" songs and the overwhelming performance where strength and warmth coexist.​ In 2018, they made a long-awaited major debut from Nippon Columbia/TRIAD.​ Released 2nd full album "ANATOMIES" on January 29, 2020.​

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.
A Mexican voice actress. She is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Nurse Joy in _Pokémon_ and Felicity Smoak/Overwatch  in the _Arrowverse_.
